user_preferences.preference: Use Pencil.dev MCP for UI component design and verification
user_preferences.context: All UI tasks in Epics 3 and 4 should reference Pencil canvas designs

user_preferences.preference: Neo-brutalist styling with thick borders (2-4px), hard shadows, #0A0A0A background, #F5F5F5 text
user_preferences.context: Apply consistently across all UI components

project_conventions.convention: UI tasks require Pencil MCP visual verification before completion
